title: Assessment Start
description: Request Access and Define Project Details
details: Request Access
Define Client Name
Define Project Key Name
Create an assessment name (auto-generated from Client + Project)
Raise access request for more users if any
label: Assessment Start

title: Benchmark the KPIs
details: Ability to download template
Ability to import Template 1 for Benchmarks
Ability to import Template 2 for Benchmarks
Generate Quartile Plots
Generate Improvement Ranges
Generate comments on the KPI performance
label: Benchmark the KPIs

title: Calculate the KPIs
description: Calculate KPI Values Using Input Data
details: Ability to download template
Ability to import Templates for calculating each KPI
Ability to view the values being calculated (See adjacent picture)
Once they click on it, they must be able to see different cuts of the KPIs
label: Calculate the KPIs

title: Conduct Financial Analysis
details: Ability to download template
Ability to import data for VIP input
View the outputs
label: Conduct Financial Analysis

title: Diagnostics
details: Ability to download template
Ability to import Questionnaire
View myD outputs
label: Diagnostics

title: Deliver
details: A comprehensive view of all the outputs combined
Key output visualization per KPI, Financial analysis, Diagnostics
Filter for Plan, Source, Fulfil can be added here
Brief Summary
Detailed Summary on how to improve the Supply chain
Chat bot with standard prompts to support the modification of output view or answer questions
Option to download the output
label: Deliver

title: Progress Meter
details: Should be visible in each page showing how the assessment is progressing
label: Progress Meter
